thread.title: Donald Trump Is Terrified Of The Media — Sad!
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Is Terrified Of The Media — Sad!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Donald Trump Is Terrified Of The Media — Sad!
text:
2/25/2017 5:30 PM ET | Filed under: Icky Icky Poo • Wacky, Tacky & True • Media Minute • Politik • Donald Trump • Twitter • Crazzzzy • Viral: News • White House Correspondents Dinner 
The media is NOT the enemy of the American people — but journalists are a hell of a lot tougher than Donald Trump ! 
The President just tweeted out an important message about the White House Correspondents' Association Dinner , and oh look, guess what — the big tough talker can't take the heat! 
Related: Bernie Sanders 1, Donald Trump 0 
Here's what The Donald tweet about a half hour ago (below): 
I will not be attending the White House Correspondents' Association Dinner this year. Please wish everyone well and have a great evening! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 25, 2017 
Seriously?! 
Come on, Donald! 
You talk MAD shit about the media, and then on the one night where they get to push back tongue-in-cheek at a notoriously funny ceremony, you all of a sudden will not be attending?? 
Related: Meryl Streep Is Totally Going To Blast Drumpf Again 
No wonder The Donald has caved so seriously to Vladimir Putin … the leader of the free world is terrified by something as simple as a free press, let alone a dictator! The poor President is scared of the news! He needs his alternative facts to feel good! 
Weak! Sad! Scared!
